perturbation.original_text:
Within ten (10) days of the Effective Date of this Agreement, e-centives shall make a non-refundable payment to Excite@Home of $***** as pre-payment for Payment-Eligible User Data records:

     (1)  e-centives will pay Excite@Home $***** in pre-payments for                ***** General Program Member User Data records.

     (2)  e-centives will pay Excite@Home $***** in pre-payments for                ***** Qualified Program Member User Data records.
perturbation.changed_text:
Within sixty (60) days of the Effective Date of this Agreement, e-centives shall make a non-refundable payment to Excite@Home of $***** as pre-payment for Payment-Eligible User Data records:

     (1)  e-centives will pay Excite@Home $***** in pre-payments for                ***** General Program Member User Data records.

     (2)  e-centives will pay Excite@Home $***** in pre-payments for                ***** Qualified Program Member User Data records.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline from 'Within ten (10) days' to 'Within sixty (60) days.' This creates uncertainty regarding the actual due date of the initial payment, leading to potential disputes over contractual obligations.

perturbation.original_text: Each Party will pay all earned and undisputed outstanding amounts owed to the other Party under this Agreement within thirty (30) days after the effective date of such termination. Notwithstanding the foregoing, all payments for User Data records shall be due and accrue in accordance with terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party will pay all earned and undisputed outstanding amounts owed to the other Party under this Agreement within ninety (90) days after the effective date of such termination. Notwithstanding the foregoing, all payments for User Data records shall be due and accrue in accordance with terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by modifying the payment deadline after termination from 'thirty (30) days' to 'ninety (90) days.' This creates confusion about the timeframe for settling outstanding dues upon contract termination, potentially leading to enforcement issues.

perturbation.original_text: Within three business days of receiving Application Provider's written update, Excite@Home will remove any advertising from Application Provider's listed competitors displayed on the Co-Branded Pages.
perturbation.changed_text: Within fifteen business days of receiving Application Provider's written update, Excite@Home will remove any advertising from Application Provider's listed competitors displayed on the Co-Branded Pages.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by extending the timeframe for removing competitor advertising. This makes the enforcement of the advertising restriction ambiguous.
